--- delete.sql
delete foo where foo = 1 and bar = 2
--- AST
&parser.Delete{
  pos:       0,
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  7,
    end:  10,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  As:    (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
  Where: &parser.Where{
    pos:  11,
    Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "AND",
      Left: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  17,
          end:  20,
          Name: "foo",
        },
        Right: &parser.IntLiteral{
          pos:   23,
          end:   24,
          Base:  10,
          Value: "1",
        },
      },
      Right: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  29,
          end:  32,
          Name: "bar",
        },
        Right: &parser.IntLiteral{
          pos:   35,
          end:   36,
          Base:  10,
          Value: "2",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DELETE FROM foo WHERE foo = 1 AND bar = 2
